  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Deprecated. 
    use DocIndexerXmlHandlers instead; see project site for a guide

    @Deprecated
public abstract class DocIndexerXml
extends DocIndexerAbstract
    Abstract base class for a DocIndexer processing XML files.
